TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear
We have another long journey ahead of us.
We have another long journey ahead of us.
We have another long journey ahead of us.
We have another long journey ahead of us.
Where to this time?
Where to this time?
Where to this time?
Where to this time?
Somewhere in the southern lands is a Knight who has fashioned the Crest of Sartek into a helmet. He dwells at a place called the Red Tower, but we do not know where that is.
Somewhere in the southern lands is a Knight who has fashioned the Crest of Sartek into a helmet. He dwells at a place called the Red Tower, but we do not know where that is.
Somewhere in the southern lands is a Knight who has fashioned the Crest of Sartek into a helmet. He dwells at a place called the Red Tower, but we do not know where that is.
Somewhere in the southern lands is a Knight who has fashioned the Crest of Sartek into a helmet. He dwells at a place called the Red Tower, but we do not know where that is.
I've been to this Red Tower - it's in the town of Maethelburg, home to the Knights of the Riverguard.
I've been to this Red Tower - it's in the town of Maethelburg, home to the Knights of the Riverguard.
I've been to this Red Tower - it's in the town of Maethelburg, home to the Knights of the Riverguard.
I've been to this Red Tower - it's in the town of Maethelburg, home to the Knights of the Riverguard.
Then lead the way!
Then lead the way!
Then lead the way!
Then lead the way!
